definition: to disobey/to defy/deliberately going against (rule, convention, sb's wishes etc)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
to bend in two so as to break/to defy/to disobey/also pr. [ao3]

sentences.english: She disobeyed her father and married that man.
sentences.chinese: 她違拗父親的意願而嫁給那個男人。
